TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed ToolTipService extends System.Object
public ref class ToolTipService abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示一项服务，该服务提供用于控制工具提示的显示和行为的属性和事件。

span.span: Represents a service that provides properties and events to control the display and behavior of tooltips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置定义的元素的工具提示或属性。You define a tooltip for an element by setting the or property. 该工具提示属性接受一个子级。The ToolTip property takes one child. 子内容可以不同而有所不同的简单文本字符串到更复杂的内容如具有嵌入文本和元素。The content of the child can vary from a simple text string to more complex content such as a that has embedded text and elements. 你可以定义作为工具提示内容对象，但这不是必需。You can define tooltip content as a object, but this is not required. 当未定义作为内容的工具提示对象时，可以使用属性，以定位和自定义工具提示的内容。When you do not define the tooltip content as a object, you can use the properties to position and customize the tooltip content. 附加属性的类用于确定放置、 行为和工具提示的外观。Attached properties of the class are used to determine the placement, behavior, and appearance of a tooltip. 定义工具提示的元素上设置这些属性。These properties are set on the element that defines the tooltip. 类和类分享了许多相同的属性，用于自定义工具提示。The class and the class share many of the same properties that are used to customize a tooltip. 如果等效和都设置属性，属性优先。If equivalent and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 例如，如果这两个属性和属性设置为对象、 的值使用属性。For example, if both the property and the property are set for a object, the value of the property is used. 以下执行时间属性仅适用于类，并由所有工具提示：The following timing properties are only defined for the class and are used by all tooltips: - - - 有关如何处理工具提示打开或关闭时发生的事件的信息，请参阅和字段。For information about how to handle the events that occur when the tooltip opens or closes, see the and fields. ， ， ，和中具有相同名称的属性的行为类似类。, , , , and behave similarly to the properties of the same name in the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类指定工具提示的行为。The following example shows how the use the class to specify the behavior of a tooltip. 设置的属性通过附加它们直接到公开工具提示的元素的类。You set the properties of the class by attaching them directly to the element that exposes the tooltip. [!code-xaml[ToolTipService#NoToolTip](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#notooltip)]

summary.span: 标识由使用 服务显示工具提示的对象公开的 事件。

span.span: Identifies the event that is exposed by objects that use the service to display tooltips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即将工具提示关闭之前发生的事件。The event occurs immediately before a tooltip closes. 此字段注册的行为事件使用此服务的类。This field registers the behavior of the event for classes that use this service. 和类都实现和公开这样的此事件通过[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]访问器和。The and classes both implement the and expose this event through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessors and . 如果指定为工具提示对象，关闭工具提示时，也会引发事件。If you specify the tooltip as a object, the event is also raised when the tooltip closes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows how to set an event handler for the event. 在这种情况下，事件处理程序为实际，这是因为附加处理程序是一个派生的类。In this case, the event handler is actually for , because the where the handler is attached is a derived class of . [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#ToolTipServiceEventHandlers](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#tooltipserviceeventhandlers)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#ToolTipServiceEventHandlers](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#tooltipserviceeventhandlers)] [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#ToolTipOpenAndCloseHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#tooltipopenandclosehandler)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#ToolTipOpenAndCloseHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#tooltipopenandclosehandler)]

public: static initonly System::Windows::RoutedEvent ^ ToolTipOpeningEvent;

summary.span: 标识由使用 服务显示工具提示的对象公开的 事件。

span.span: Identifies the event that is exposed by objects that use the service to display tooltips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件立即在工具提示打开之前发生。The event occurs immediately before a tooltip opens. 如果未定义工具提示或设置工具提示的内容不会发生此事件为 null。This event does not occur if the tooltip is not defined or if the tooltip content is set to null. 此字段注册的行为事件使用此服务的类。This field registers the behavior of the event for classes that use this service. 和类都实现和公开这样的此事件通过[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]访问器和。The and classes both implement the and expose this event through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessors and . 如果指定为工具提示对象，工具提示打开时，也会引发事件。If you specify the tooltip as a object, the event is also raised when the tooltip opens. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows how to set an event handler for the event. 在这种情况下，事件处理程序为实际，这是因为附加处理程序是一个派生的类。In this case, the event handler is actually for , because the where the handler is attached is a derived class of . [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#ToolTipServiceEventHandlers](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#tooltipserviceeventhandlers)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#ToolTipServiceEventHandlers](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#tooltipserviceeventhandlers)] [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#ToolTipOpenAndCloseHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#tooltipopenandclosehandler)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#ToolTipOpenAndCloseHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#tooltipopenandclosehandler)]
